title: Google hardware gets unified security reward program that covers Pixel, Nest, and Fitbit
content:
Last year, Google introduced a new Bug Hunters platform to encompass all its Vulnerability Reward Programs. An expanded “Android and Google Devices Security Reward Program” now brings Nest and Fitbit into the fold with Pixel.

more…

The post Google hardware gets unified security reward program that covers Pixel, Nest, and Fitbit appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An expanded "Android and Google Devices Security Reward Program" on Bug Hunters now brings Nest and Fitbit into the fold with Pixel phones....
